amendment.description: An amendment to strike all after the resolving clause and insert complete new text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and the resolution without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McGovern.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
